poem:
### The Quiet Ledger

In the hushed cathedral of commerce,  
the pendulum of numbers swings.  
Expectations hover like gulls  
over the cliffs of speculation.  
The silent watch of men in black,  
their decisions, whispers on the wind,  
echo through the stone corridors  
where money sleeps and dreams dissolve  
into the dust of yesterday.
